document_data.name: Crypt King
document_data.mainbody:
'''Crypt King''' was an angry [[undead]] [[specter]] that dwelt within one of the tombs of [[Athkatla]]'s [[Athkatla/Grave District|Grave District]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''You too will die for disturbing my rest.''|Crypt King}}
document_data.Possessions: The creature wore [[plate armor]] and an open-faced [[helmet]] while wielding an [[enchanted]] [[sword]] called ''[[Namarra]]''.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Crypt King was a restless and vengeful undead being, woken from his slumber by some unknown individuals. Crypt King was ready to slay anyone unwise enough to either the crypt. It gained an upper hand in battle as it radiated an aura of powerful ''[[horror]]'' that could rattle and render weak-willed creatures defenseless agains the specter.
